t: Amazon.PLans for Poland
s: Amazon launched a new online marketplace in Poland: amazon.pl. Amazon is not new to Poland. The ecommerce giant has been present in the country since 2009, operating nine fulfillment centers (with a tenth under construction right now). The company currently employs over 18.000 people in Poland.
